headline: Higher Education Summit: essential information
text: Venue Senate House Malet Street London WC1E 7HU Switchboard: 0207 862 8500Map  How to get there  The closet underground stations are Russell Square (Piccadilly Line) and Goodge Street (Northern Line) London Euston, King Cross and St Pancras are very close by and there are a number of buses. Contact us Guardian conference teamTelephone: 01462 476 315
